professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in Microsoft SQL Server and Oracle DB Administration. Proven track record in managing and maintaining complex databases, optimizing performance, and implementing high-load systems.

key_responsibilities: edit data in Warehouse management system.
Coordination and management of processes for workflow.
Introduce new ERP system WMS-1C Enterprise.
Administration and technical support of ERP system Microsoft Dynamics AX.
Administration and maintenance of heavily loaded ERP systems (24/7).
Administration and maintenance of Oracle DBMS.
Support and maintenance of MS SQL Server databases.
